wrong-password: The password or email is invalid.
user-not-found: There is no user record corresponding to this identifier.
invalid-email: The email address is badly formatted.
email-already-in-use: The email address is already in use by another account.
weak-password: Weak password. Password should be at least 6 characters.
error-unknown: An error has occurred while processing your request... Try later.
field-must-be-alpha: The field must contain only letters
field-must-be-numeric: The field must contain only numbers
field-must-be-latin-alpha-num: The field must contain only numbers and latin letters
field-must-be-min-length: The field must contain at least {length} characters
field-must-be-max-length: The field must contain a maximum of {length} characters
field-must-be-unique-nickname: This nickname is already in use
field-must-be-email: The field must be a valid email address
field-must-be-phone: The field must be a valid phone number
